original_text: and the sin they have committed becomes known, they must bring as their offering for the sin they committed a female goat without defect.
korean_text: 그가 범한 죄를 누가 그에게 깨우쳐 주면 그는 흠 없는 암염소를 끌고 와서 그 범한 죄로 말미암아 그것을 예물로 삼아

sentences.original_text: and the sin they have committed becomes known
they must bring as their offering
